name: Chronomancer Prototype
description:
Chronomancer is a fairly early game prototype made by a group of students at AIE as a second year major production.

Its a squad based strategy game in the style of X-COM set in a High Magic Dark Fantasy world.

Designers

Christopher Atkinson
Renee Noble
Toby Kelty

Programmer
Huy Lee

Artists
Chelsea Summers
Luke Lawson
Luke Taylor
Russel Anderson

Additional Credits
Additional Animations - Joe Anderson
Forest,Town music - Zac Kelty
Temple music - Chris O'Neill
Additional Icons - https://icons8.com
Audio - www.soundsnap.com
